Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Clinton. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Clinton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
